title: The Cheapest Gaming Laptop From Best Buy...
description: *Video Sponsor: Check out DeepCool's New LT720 AIO and their Amazon store here:    I bought the cheapest gaming laptop from Best Buy to see if it's any good.  See the Laptop on Best Buy Canada here:    Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on by 'Joining' the channel on YouTube here:  Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
